SEARCH
Module comp2013
Package comp2013.Controller

Interface IController

All Known Implementing Classes:
SnakeController
public interface IController
The main brains of the program, used to sync actions from the View and Model.
Author:
Toby Surtees

  • Method Details

    • checkSelfCollide

      boolean checkSelfCollide()
      Checks if the snake has hit itself
      Returns:
      True if it has hit itself, False if not.

    • checkOutOfBounds

      boolean checkOutOfBounds()
      Check if the snake is out of bounds.
      Returns:
      True if snake is out of bounds, False if not.

    • moveSnake

      void moveSnake()
      Move the snake in a specified direction Only works if the snake is still alive. If not, calls the function to end the game.

    • addSegment

      void addSegment(int x, int y, boolean newSegment)
      Adds a segment to the snake.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of the segment.
      y - Y coordinate of the segment
      newSegment - If true, increment length, else length stays the same.

    • handleKeyPress

      void handleKeyPress(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code)
      Decides what happens when a key is pressed.
      Parameters:
      code - The code for the key that was pressed.

    • handleGameOver

      void handleGameOver()
      Handles what happens when the game ends.

    • restartGame

      void restartGame()
      Restarts the game to its original state.
